welcome_message_body: Welcome to Shenzhen, a vibrant city known for its modern skyline, rich history, and bustling markets. We hope you enjoy exploring all the charm and excitement this city has to offer. Happy travels!

restaurants.name: The Ritz-Carlton Club Lounge
restaurants.description: The Ritz-Carlton Club Lounge is a american restaurant located in 深圳市.
restaurants.address: 26F / The Ritz-Carlton, Shenzhen (116 Fuhua San Road (Futian District)), 深圳市, 广东, 518048

restaurants.name: Haidilao Hot Pot (海底捞火锅)
restaurants.description: Haidilao Hot Pot (海底捞火锅) is a hotpot restaurant located in 深圳市.
restaurants.address: 福华三路卓越世纪潮流荟商场4楼L401-L402, 深圳市, 广东

restaurants.name: CoCo ICHIBANYA (CoCo壹番屋)
restaurants.description: CoCo ICHIBANYA (CoCo壹番屋) is a japanese curry restaurant located in 深圳市.
restaurants.address: Underground Fuhua Rd (C11 Link City), 福田区, 深圳市, 广东

restaurants.name: Bus Grill Turkish Steakhouse
restaurants.description: Bus Grill Turkish Steakhouse is a turkish restaurant located in 深圳市.

restaurants.name: SHARK • Fine Wine & Dine
restaurants.description: SHARK • Fine Wine & Dine is a seafood restaurant located in 深圳市.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal mainly used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal mainly used for international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hong Kong International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Hong Kong International Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Hong Kong International Airport, exclusively used by Cathay Pacific and its partners.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi for up to 4 hours by connecting to the network and completing a simple registration process.
